ygData.subject: Re: Alliance - March!
ygData.msgSnippet: Alloran, if HellBat was hit by one of the EMPs, he d be out for the fight, at least for a while Electro Magnetic Pulse would shut down his circuits. And Jason,

Alloran, if HellBat was hit by one of the EMPs, he'd be out for the 
fight, at least for a while Electro Magnetic Pulse would shut down 
his circuits.

And Jason, your bots wouldn't have the clearence neccessary to raise 
CF shields. Please keep that in mind for next time.

::FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Repressor/Rex/Proto/Firearm/Kluster::

Astral looks at FZ as he recieves Dark One's transmission. "Is that a 
valid order, sir?"

FZ turns his head to look at him. "No," he replies. The Lavacons look 
at FZ in surprise.

"Attack the Cybertronian Fire, yes," FZ says in Zardus' voice, now 
transmitting to the entire Alliance force there, "But if you see Iron 
Raptor, kill her. SHe's useless."

The Iron Fist's computer, acting as part of FZ's brain, was matching 
Feline's info of the CF with general information of Maximal battle 
cruisers. The codes probably wouldn't have gotten through to Iron 
Raptor. The Maximals were useless except for Kluster and Chordate. 
Those two held all the keys.

"THe only two Maximals we want are Chordate and Kluster. If you see 
those two, capture them," he continues his orders, flying forward and 
pulling out a missile launcher. FZ, while identical to Zardus, had a 
different array of weapons. He fires. The missile glows blue as it 
heads for the shields. A shot hits it, but reflects off the glowing 
blue energy cover. It hits and explodes, sending a blue flare of 
energy through the shields.

"Kill everyone else," he continues his orders, "Gestalts, do not form 
yet. You'd be too easy a target for the defences and for the emeny. 
Wait untill they are weakened."

He ducks under autogun fire, firing two more missiles at the shields.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral nods at FZ's orders. "You heard 'im!" he says to his team, the 
five flying toward the Cybertronian Fire.

They spread out, ducking under autogun shots and firing back with 
their rifles. THey were all using energy weapons now, trying to take 
out the shields.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex joggs up behind the Alliance forces, panting. His jetpack had 
taken too much damage to keep flying from the earlier battle. He aims 
at FZ's back, but is thrown to the ground by several laser shots.

Repressor flies up behind him. "Ha, nice try!" Repressor opens fire, 
more shots streaming toward Rex.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto launches into the air, opening fire on Dark One. He aims his 
rapid-fire rifle carefully as he fires.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler takes aim, firing a shot at Perndabot. He growls as the 
Alliance bot ducks under the shot and fires back with two missiles. 
The missiles hit the shields and explode.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Slag!" Kluster exclaims, watching the energy readings from weapons 
hitting the shields. His eyes widen as he sees a reading from a new 
weapon. He'd never seen something like it before. It seemed to be a 
missile, but it sucked energy when it hit.

He swears. It had done quite a bit of damage to the shields, same 
with the other Alliance attacks.

"Those Alliance bots are way smarter than the Preds," he notes to no 
one in particular. He looks at Chordate, "I'm rerouting all 
unneccessary energy to the shields and weapons. We don't need lights, 
food, or holorooms for now. Everything's going to defences. Well, and 
CRs."

He taps in a sequence on the keyboard, the lights on the bridge going 
out. It remains lit by glowing computer screens.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm stops a mile away from the Cybertronian Fire, his scanners 
detecting gunfire.

"There's an attack," he says to Iris, "Think you can do any good in 
battle?"
